title.native: ポーション頼みで生き延びます！

description:
Nagase Kaoru, a 22-year-old office lady, suddenly finds herself reincarnated in another world. To help her survive in this new world, a being that amounts to its god gives Kaoru a younger body and... the ability to make insanely overpowered potions?! The reincarnated Kaoru must use her knowledge and cheatery to survive!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

title.native: ポーション頼みで生き延びます！
ポーション頼みで生き延びます！

alternative: Kishin Francette (鬼神 フランセット)

node.description:
[Syosetu](http://mypage.syosetu.com/79012/)

A Japanese writer from the Kansai region.

Started writing on Shousetsuka ni Narou at November 2nd 2015 when published the first chapter of [Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu](https://anilist.co/manga/101716/). Despite being from the Kansai, after visiting every part of Japan, decided to settle on the Kantou Region. Have as hobbies amateur radio and small boating (having licenses for both). Also have a weather forecaster license.

A Japanese duo consisting of two female voice actors, [Haruki Iwata](https://anilist.co/staff/126658/Haruki-Iwata) and [Moeka Koizumi](https://anilist.co/staff/126657/Moeka-Koizumi), who appear in popular stage plays, anime and mobile games. harmoe is a new project that recreates the world of fairy tales on stage by way of easy-listening dance pop music for the whole world to enjoy. Their debut single, “Kimagure Ticktack”, was released in March 2021.

[Website](https://harmoe.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/harmoe_official)
Youhei Takami is a magazine editor.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 2 - My Goal Is a Safe, Worry-Free Life in Another World!
Episode 3 - I'm Gonna Go Speak My Mind at the Castle!
Episode 4 - I'm Going into Angel Mode to Fight Back!
Episode 5 - I'll Use the Goddess's Potions to Do Business!
Episode 6 - I'll Use My Cheat to Destroy an Army!
Episode 7 - The Goddess Descends to End the War!
Episode 8 - I'm Seen as a Beautiful Girl and Abducted!
Episode 9 - "I'm Going to Relax in a Hot Spring for a While!
Episode 10 - Going Back to My Original Goal in a New Country!
Episode 11 - I'll Find a Husband with a Treasure Hunt!
Episode 12 - I Shall Survive Using Potions!
